name: The Montreal Curfew Countdown (Je me souviens)
description: After 139 days, the curfew will be lifted tomorrow at 9:30PM Montreal time. Once we reach this moment, this timer will count how long it has been since the curfew was lifted. The price is set to match the total number of hours during which this curfew was in place. If there were to be another curfew in the future, the buyer will receive an updated OBJKT/NFT. This piece exists in French at https://tripledoublev.net/couvre-feu/
